I didn't want to say that saving state_dict is not recommended, I meant that both these ways are equally good, and it all comes down to personal preference.

Hm ok, I think having intermediate wrappers would still work as you can execute arbitrary code in your model's forward, but it's hard to say as I don't know the exact structure of your model. If you're willing to share it I can take a look and see.

About the serialization, yeah we could probably replace deserialized non-leaf Variables with None, but first I'll have to think if it won't have any unexpected consequences.
